page.title: 07A LOCAL FARM (UPLANDS)
page.content:
Uplands Farm is situated off the A27 road. The farmers name is Mr Foley. He owns 56.5 acres. He grows no crops at all. His main product is beef. He also owns some Suffolk sheep, a cross Hereford bull, some Charolias and som e Fresians. His average cow costs Â£700 to Â£800.His cows weigh roughly 200 kilos. Most of his grass is sown and he lets his sheep flatten it out. He has seven breeding cows that produce a calf every year. He also owns twelve breeding ewes. He does all his own work. He wakes up at 08.00 and finishes at 17.00. Most of his land is rough grazing.
{************************************** { { By Mark Cole age 11 {
